phrases: What should I do for training?
W- what should I do to train?
To begin with, you do not need to do anything.
Just live.
Live?
Right.
Try surviving all by yourself without anything happening to you.
If you can survive without incident for six months, I will teach you how to fight.
Six months, by myself, in this place?
No way!
I will die of loneliness!
You will not be lonesome.
This place is teaming with beasts that are thirsting for blood.
No, do not do this!
Do not leave me here!
Right now, you do not have time to be spoiled!
But...
Survive somehow for the next six months, and make yourself tougher,
both physically and mentally.
Do not forget that you hold the key to earth's fate in your hand.
Believe in your own power.
And learn some way to effectively draw out that power.
But I...
See you later.
Oh, right, right.
Do not think about trying to escape from here.
This place is surrounded by nothing but expansive hellish desert.
In other words,
it is a world of death that is enough to make this place look like heaven.
Wait!
Where is there any food?
What about baths?
What about a bed?
What about books, and notebooks, and pencils, and...
You think there is any of that arranged for you here, sonny boy?
Oh, no!
That is horrible!
If you have to blame something, then blame your own fate.
The way I do.
Wait!
I am scared!
Do not leave me here!
Kami- sama look strange.
Something wrong?
Sure enough, there is something different about Piccolo from how he was before.
He is still unmistakably evil,
but I sense that the devious abrasiveness he had in the past is fading away.
Popo thinks so too.
The old Daimao not make Son Goku's son strong.
What made me clearly realize that there was something strange about Piccolo...
his spirit went right to the Other World.
Up until now, whenever anyone was killed by the Demon Clan,
their spirit had been unable to pass beyond,
and they drifted through the air, as they suffered.
Did a guy named Raditz wash up here?
Yeah, he was here all right.
And yet, since Raditz had gone to the Other World,
Piccolo is clearly different from how he was before.
You mean Piccolo has good heart?
Perhaps he realizes it too.
My life- and thus Piccolo's life
-has only one more year left in it.
One more year?
Whether it is because Piccolo will be killed
by the Saiyans that are to arrive in another year,
or whether it is because that is when my lifetime will run out, I do not know.
Kami- sama...
My death means death for Piccolo, and Piccolo's death means death for me.
Even being Kami,
it is not a pleasant thing to know the time when one's death will come.
He has to be sensing it too.
Maybe he just wants to leave something of himself behind,
even if it is to Son Goku's son.
Then, possibility of using Dragon Balls...
This next time will be the last one.
I am scared!
Ee-yow!
Wait up!
You did not have to go around my neck like that.
I had no idea at all that Gohan was as strong as all that.
He is my son, after all...
That is right!
I do not have to run along the entire road at all, huh?
All right then!
At this rate, I will get there in no time!
That was close, that was close!
That is hell there beneath the clouds.
Son Goku has... unfortunately... been killed.
I wonder if the shock will be too much like that.
Um, I am terribly sorry, but Goku will not be returning,
and has entered his eternal sleep.
Then again, he is coming back to life, huh?
That is it!
I will do it cheerfully!
Yeah!
Goku died, but he is coming back to life right away, so do not worry.
Kuririn!
G- g- good afternoon.
What are you doing out here, mumbling to yourself?
W- well, you see, um... as it happens...
Heya!
It is been a while!
G- good afternoon...
That is nice of you...
Are not you together with Goku- sa and the others?
Yeah, um, the truth is, Goku has d- d- ...
What?
What is that?
So he is going to be late?
Yeah, um, yes.
The truth is, the late Goku will not be returning...
He said he is not comin' home?
Er, no, he will be returning to us very soon...
I do not get what it is you are sayin'!
Now, now, it is no good to stand here talkin' like this!
Come on in the house!
Come on, come on!
I cannot wait to see my grandson's happy face!
I are not even seen him in a over year now.
I bet he is gotten a lot bigger, huh?
l cannot handle this.
I cannot tell them.
Not that he will not be back for a year...
Nobody's told me anythin', so I called the Kame House earlier,
but nobody was there.
Y- yeah, come to mention it,
everyone is gone off to some uninhabited island somewhere to play.
That must be it.
You would not be able to reach them there... would you?
But Goku- sa and them will be back by nighttime, yeah?
Y- yeah...
I suppose...
Goku- sa aside, Gohan has his studyin', you know?
He cannot just skip it.
You know, Goku- sa cannot do anythin' as a parent!
Do not go gettin' so jumpy, Chichi.
This is Goku we are talkin' about.
He will be sure to bring him home.
Just relax.
Really?
You are right.
Good.
They will probably be comin' back hungry,
so I better go make some dinner.
Um...
I should be heading on back soon...
B- but why?
You just barely got here, didn'cha?
You could wait here until Goku- sa and Gohan get back.
At least have some dinner first!
B- but I have things to attend to...
Look, do not worry, do not worry.
Mother!
Help!
Somebody help!
I cannot get down!
Come on, come on, they are going to burn!
Eat up, eat up!
Before long, Goku will be bringin' Gohan home!
I cannot stand for this any longer!
Ogre spirits.
One crazy dancer drink.
Sure, sure...
Here is my check.
Thanks for coming.
Here is your change.
I beg your pardon.
H - how creepy!
I see.
And I should tell this to the Turtle guy?
Yes.
Please be sure not to forget.
Goku is a curious one, huh?
He still wants to become stronger?
Damn... that guy lied to me!
He said I would not get hungry, but here I am, hungry!
I am scared and cold!
I am so hungry I could die!
Apples!
Some apples fell down!
How lucky!
Oh well...
Yuck, they are sour!
I want some juice or something to drink!
I want to eat shao mai dumplings!
I want my mother's curry!
Dirty brat!
Give me trouble, will you?
I am scared!
Now listen, this is the last time I lend you a hand..
From here on, if you are unable to survive,
then that is all you are worth as a kid.
Exhausted, Son Gohan sleeps.
There is no way he could have known
that one of his moments of destiny was drawing near.
